metadata.title: CVE-2023-30775 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
A vulnerability was found in the libtiff library. This security flaw causesa heap buffer overflow in extractContigSamples32bits, tiffcrop.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-30775` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.3.0-6ubuntu0.2
libtiff-tools - 4.3.0-6ubuntu0.2
libtiff5 - 4.3.0-6ubuntu0.2
libtiffxx5 - 4.3.0-6ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.3.0-6ubuntu0.2').
